attributes.action: Stop mandatory vaccines for club entry.
attributes.additional_details: This is blackmail and against individually.
attributes.background: The government have made it mandatory for anyone over 18 to be double jabbed for COVID-19 to enter clubs or concerts.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not require Covid vaccination passports for crowded events: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592671

Don't restrict admission to nightclubs to only vaccinated customers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592668

Outlaw discrimination against those who do not get a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
